name: Admin Events Extended
author: Todd Halfpenny

sections.description:
Adds further source to community events and news to the admin dashboard widget. Currently only supports adding WordPress London events.

Roadmap or maybes

  1. Order events correctly by date
  2. Support for more than just WordPress London
  3. Support for external news feeds also
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory admin-events-extended and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory admin-events-extended and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

External events are not showing up

The events listings are cached in your WordPress database for about 12 hours. Check back tomorrow, and if they’re still not there please raise a support ticket.

Why does it only show one event from the external feed?

I’ve not got round to that yet
